scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && pnpm start:dev" " cd client && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && pnpm build" "cd client && pnpm build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && pnpm start" "cd client &&  pnpm start"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && pnpm lint" "cd client && pnpm lint"
scripts.installp: concurrently "pnpm i" "cd client && pnpm i" "cd server && pnpm i"
